Class RetailTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • RetailTransaction

  • public class RetailTransaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Information for 1 transaction from a store

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RetailTransaction()
      Initialize a new transaction with default values.
      RetailTransaction(java.lang.String transaction)
      Initialize a new transaction using a String with the necessary values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RetailTransaction

        public RetailTransaction(java.lang.String transaction)
        Initialize a new transaction using a String with the necessary values. The total and number of items are both initialized to 0.
        Parameters:
        transaction - String in the format [transaction id],[register id],[transaction type]

      • RetailTransaction

        public RetailTransaction()
        Initialize a new transaction with default values. The transaction's id is set to 0, the transaction type to an empty string, the total to 0, the number of items to 0, and the register id to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String item,
                    ProductCatalog catalog)
        Add a new item to the transaction. Tax and warranty will be added to cost as needed.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to be added to transaction. The String should be of the format [product type],[quantity],[warranty quantity].
        catalog - Product catalog used for this transaction

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String representation used for output
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String output for files and console

      • formatTotalSales

        public static java.lang.String formatTotalSales()
        String value of the amount of all transactions completed
        Returns:
        String of the total sales in dollar format; is enclosed in parentheses if the amount is negative

      • getTotalSales

        public static double getTotalSales()
        Value of all transactions completed
        Returns:
        Value of all transactions

      • getTransactionId

        public long getTransactionId()
        Unique identifier for the transaction
        Returns:
        Transaction identifier

      • getTransactionType

        public java.lang.String getTransactionType()
        Whether the transaction is a sale or return
        Returns:
        "sale" if sale; "return" if return

      • getTotal

        public double getTotal()
        Purchase total
        Returns:
        Purchase total including warranty (if applicable) and tax

      • getNumberOfItems

        public int getNumberOfItems()
        Quantity of items sold
        Returns:
        Quantity sold

      • getRegisterId

        public int getRegisterId()
        Register used to process sale/return
        Returns:
        Register number
